function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of social norm on compliance behavior","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance with measures","Mitigation":"Educating and promoting positive social norms, reinforcing the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Social media, public messaging campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inequality in compliance due to practical limitations","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance among disadvantaged individuals","Mitigation":"Providing support and resources for practical compliance, addressing economic and social barriers","Technologies":"Community support programs, targeted assistance","People":"Disadvantaged individuals","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Potential decline in compliant behavior over time","Impact":"Risk of diminishing adherence to measures over extended period","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring, adaptive messaging, and reinforcement of compliance messages","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveillance systems, communication platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
